commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That's it for practice today! So, you all ready for a study sesh?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, please.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Please go easy on us.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I sure hope I do a good job.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It's all up to these two here. Why don't we start by looking at your last test scores?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Boy, this is kind of embarrassing...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I feel the same way. Having someone point out all of your mistakes is pretty scary.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hmm, hmm. I see, I see. Ah, yes.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Not bad at all. You have better grades than me in a lot of subjects.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Right? Looks like we didn't have a whole lot to worry about. But your science and math scores? These are pretty dire.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Urgh... I've never been good at science or math.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Me neither. They're just so hard, I get super sleepy. Just hearing about them gives me a headache...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Kanata, Shizuku, you can do it. Rina-chan Board says, "Let's do this!"

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, but studying isn't something you can just bang your head against 'til you get it. It's not gonna stick unless you really wanna learn.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That might be true. It's not easy to get motivated.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But we've gotta figure out how to do it no matter what! Our club depends on it!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Y-Yes! You're right! I will do my very best, so please don't lose faith in me!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I will, too! Studying is just something we have to do, after all.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Now you're motivated! Rina-chan Board says, "Serious!"

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: All right, let's get this over and done with!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, hold on a sec. I've got a message from Ruby. She says she wishes she could join in on the science and math study session.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's a shame she's so far away in Numazu.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes, it would be difficult for her to come all the way out here on a weekday.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It would be more exciting to study with everyone here. I'll tell her we should study when we meet up on Saturday.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: It's hard to get excited over subjects you're bad at, though.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: The harder you think it is, the harder it'll be.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, what Rinari said! You should think of math as like, a puzzle or a game!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: A puzzle or game?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I just don't get math. Vertices, graphs, and all that. It's not like we'll ever use that stuff in real life.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, you normally wouldn't. I really don't get why we need to be taught that kind of stuff.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Yes. This might sound extreme, but I think all one really needs to get by would be addition, subtraction, division, and multiplication.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: To be honest, you're probably right. But you gotta learn this stuff if you wanna pass your tests. It's kinda like a key item you gotta have to win the game, y'know?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Also, math isn't that hard. Here, let's try solving this problem.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Urgh... Just the mere sight of a quadratic function makes me want to give up.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'll try my best. I wanna get my grades up no matter what.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You're probably thinking there's a lot of work in this, right? Well, there really isn't.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: What do you mean by that?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: If you take a real close look at the questions, there's plenty of hints for which formulas to use.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Once you figure out how to find those, all you gotta do is plug and play. You don't have to put any more thought into it.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: See here, Shizuku? This textbook has tips for worded math problems and what combinations of formulas to use. Have a look.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Okay.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Lemme see... Oh, I get it. I never knew there were hints hidden here. Ai, do you have a textbook like that for me, too?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You bet I do! But I don't know third-year stuff myself, so I asked Eli about it.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yay! Thanks!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'd memorized the formulas, but I had no idea how to apply them up until now. But this textbook makes it all very easy to understand!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Math is easy-peasy once you understand the tricks behind it!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Did you bring this book just for us today?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Nah, it's not mine. I got it from the library. We totally lucked out finding something so easy to understand!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You even went through the trouble of preparing studying materials. Thank you very much!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: C'mon, this is barely preparation. But now those quadratic functions aren't so scary, huh? You can master quadratic functions with a square night's slumber!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I prefer sleeping in a circle, myself.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: You do realize that was a play on words?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: You two sure know how to kill a joke.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Now then, onto the next problem. I'm not great at explaining it out loud, so I'll explain using this.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ooh, a flip board, huh? And you're just using pictures? I've seen celebrities doing this before!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm no celebrity, but here I go.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Chuckle* This looks like it's going to be interesting.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: It sure does. I'm really looking forward to it.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah! Changing how you view things can make even something you hate fun, even studying. Take that little insight home with you today!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Will do! I think I might actually start liking math.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: All right! Kanata, let's ace our next math exam!
